Kasus Perusakan Depot Elpiji Karena Dugaan Penimbunan, Hakim Diminta Bijak
02 Nov 2019, 20:58 by saifullah nurdin


Kasus Perusakan Depot Elpiji Karena Dugaan Penimbunan, Hakim Diminta Bijak

KBRN, Lhokseumawe : Anggota Dewan Perwakilan Daerah, Republik Indonesia (DPD-RI) asal Aceh, Sudirman, atau karib disapa Haji Uma meminta Majelis Hakim Pengadilan Negeri (PN) Lhokseumawe, untuk membebaskan (tanpa jeratan hukum) Mursyidah, yang menjadi terdakwa dalam kasus dugaan perusakan pangkalan gas LPG (Elpiji) 3 Kilogram di Meunasah Masjid, Kecamatan Muara Dua, Lhokseumawe.Hal itu ditegaskan Senator Aceh ini, saat melakukan advokasi dan mendatangi rumah kediaman janda tiga anak tersebut di Gampong Mesjid, Sabtu (2/11/2019) sore.Janda miskin tersebut, kata Haji Uma, berdasarkan kronologis kejadian, sebenarnya layak disebut pahlawan karena sudah menyelamatkan uang negara akibat dugaan penimbunan gas LPG yang dilakukan UD Herianti sejak 2013 hingga 2018.“Misalnya selama sepekan, agen menyuplai gas LPG 3 Kilogram ke pangkalan tersebut sebanyak 150 tabung. Namun diduga yang dijual ke masyarakat sekitar 50 tabung. Apabila dihitung, sekitar Rp 360 juta uang negara hilang. Baru Mursyidah yang berani (bersuara)," terang Haji Uma. Oleh karena itu, dirinya meminta perhatian, tentunya majelis hakim harus memberikan keadilan dan kebebasan bagi  Mursyidah, kalau perlu tanpa syarat, karena perempuan tersebut diklaim tidak bersalah, malah seharusnya diapresiasi. Dirinya lantas mengingatkan, jangan sampai penegakan hukum meruntuhkan nilai keadilan. “Ini tugas hakim untuk menentukan keadilan bagi rakyat dan Negara. Saya melihat ada sisi hukum yang keliru dalam kasus yang menjerat janda miskin itu, sedangkan terduga pelaku penimbunan gas yang sudah sekian lama tidak dihukum melainkan hanya diberikan sanksi tutup pangkalan, padahal sudah jelas merugikan negara,” tegasnya.Selain itu, kata Haji Uma, kasus perusakan bisa diselesaikan di desa (gampong) saja, karena ada qanun yang ditetapkan. Dan tidak perlu dibawa ke ranah hukum, apalagi yang rusak hanya segel pintu saja,“Saya berjanji akan melakukan pembelaan apabila Mursyidah tetap ditahan setelah putusan hakim. Sekali lagi saya selaku wakil rakyat ingatkan penegak hukum jangan memancing suasana, apalagi kabarnya akan ada aksi besar-besaran untuk membela Mursyidah,” pungkasnya.

Case of LPG Depot Damage Due to Alleged Hoarding, Judges Asked Wisely
02 Nov 2019, 20:58 by saifullah nurdin


Case of LPG Depot Damage Due to Alleged Hoarding, Judges Asked Wisely

KBRN, Lhokseumawe: Member of the Regional Representative Council, Republic of Indonesia (DPD-RI) from Aceh, Sudirman, or close friend called Haji Uma asking the Panel of Judges of the Lhokseumawe District Court, to release (without legal entanglement) Mursyidah, who was accused in a case alleged 3 LPogram (LPG) gas base destruction in Meunasah Masjid, Muara Dua District, Lhokseumawe. This was confirmed by the Aceh Senator, while advocating and visiting the residence of the widows of three children at the Mosque Village, Saturday (11/02/2019) afternoon. The poor widow, said Haji Uma, based on the chronology of the incident, actually deserves to be called a hero because he had saved state money due to alleged LPG gas hoarding conducted by UD Herianti from 2013 to 2018. "For example, for a week, agents supplied 3 Kilogram LPG gas to the base The 150 tubes. But it is allegedly sold about 50 tubes to the community. If calculated, around Rp 360 million in state money is lost. Only Mursyidah is brave (voiced), "explained Haji Uma. Therefore, he asked for attention, of course the judges must provide justice and freedom for Mursyidah, if necessary unconditionally, because the woman was claimed to be innocent, instead she should be appreciated. remind, do not let law enforcement undermine the value of justice. "This is the duty of the judge to determine justice for the people and the State. I see a legal side that is wrong in the case that ensnares the poor widow, whereas it is suspected that the gas accumulator who has not been punished for a long time but only sanctioned base closure, even though it is clearly detrimental to the state, "he stressed. In addition, said Haji Uma, vandalism cases can be resolved in the village (gampong), because there is a qanun established. And it does not need to be brought into the realm of law, especially the damaged one Just seal the door, "I promise I will defend if Mursyidah is still detained after the verdict of rights "Once again, as the people's representative, I remind the law enforcers not to provoke the atmosphere, moreover it is said that there will be massive action to defend Mursyidah," he concluded.
